ygData.subject: Re: Another Question about Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: not true...i ve been blinded by them before, and was still able to use my hotkeys...i heard my spells being casted, but couldn t tell if i was being
ygData.messageBody:
not true...i've been blinded by them before, and was still able to use my
hotkeys...i heard my spells being casted, but couldn't tell if i was being
interrupted or not until i was not blinded anymore

I. G wrote:

> From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
>
> If you are blinded you can not even use hotkeys.... *sigh* I know this from
> personal exp. Damn the mudmen!!!!!!!
>
> Jaxim
>
